PHRASE.LANG: You have won this reward as part of the E3® 2012 promotion. Go to Aurora to claim your free 1000XP and a fantastic new companion. [#Legal]
Vous avez gagné cette récompense à l'occasion de la promotion de l'E3® 2012. Rendez-vous chez Aurora pour obtenir vos 1000 XP gratuits et un fantastique nouveau compagnon. [#Legal]
Du hast diese Belohnung im Zuge der E3®-2012-Promotion gewonnen. Gehe nach Aurora und erhalte deine kostenlosen 1000EP sowie einen fantastischen neuen Begleiter. [#Legal]
Hai vinto questo premio come parte della promozione per l'E3® 2012. Vai su Aurora per ottenere 1000 XP e un fantastico nuovo compagno. [#Legal]
Has conseguido este premio gracias a la promoción del E3® 2012. Ve a Aurora para pedir 1000 EXP y un nuevo compañero increíble. [#Legal]
You have won this reward as part of the E3® 2012 promotion. Go to Aurora to claim your free 1000XP and a fantastic new companion. [#Legal]
E3® 2012 프로모션의 일환으로 이 리워드를 얻었습니다. Aurora로 가서 1000XP와 새로운 애완동물을 받으세요.[#Legal]
You have won this reward as part of the E3® 2012 promotion. Go to Aurora to claim your free 1000XP and a fantastic new companion. [#Legal]
您已獲得這屬於2012年E3®推廣活動中一部分的獎品道具。請前往極光群島領取您的1000點免費經驗值和神奇的新隨身夥伴。 [#Legal]
